meta.title: getProductReviewById - Catalog - API Reference
meta.description:
Gets a product review.

Request Parameters

Responses

Send a Test Request

product_id.description: The ID of the `Product` to which the resource belongs.

review_id.description: The ID of the `review` that is being operated on.

include_fields.description: Fields to include, in a comma-separated list. The ID and the specified fields will be returned.

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude, in a comma-separated list. The specified fields will be excluded from a response. The ID cannot be excluded.

blocks.data: An array of product reviews and metadata.

data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The title for the product review.

text.description: The text for the product review.

status.description: The status of the product review. Must be one of `approved`, `disapproved` or `pending`.

rating.description: The rating of the product review. Must be one of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

email.description: The email of the reviewer. Must be a valid email, or an empty string.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the product review; increments sequentially.

product_id.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product with which the review is associated.

date_created.description: Date the product review was created.

date_modified.description: Date the product review was modified.

meta.description: Empty meta object; may be used later.

data.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.
